common.name: Heavy Pressure
text: All figures in the first activated deployment group gain:
When a hero would suffer {DMG} from an attack by this figure, that hero suffers an equal amount of {STRAIN} instead.

common.name: Hidden Detonators
text: Choose an Imperial figure adjacent to two or more Rebel figures.
Each figure and object adjacent to that Imperial figure suffers 3 {DMG}. Then, the Imperial figure is defeated.
If no Imperial figure is adjacent to two or more Rebel figures, ignore this effect.

common.name: No Quarter
text: When an Imperial figure declares an attack targeting a hero who has suffered 2 or more {STRAIN}, apply +1 {SURGE} to the attack results.

common.name: Oppression
text: When a hero who has suffered 2 or more {STRAIN} declares an attack, apply +1 {EVADE} to the defense results.

common.name: Prey Upon Doubt
text: When a Rebel figure declares an attack, that Rebel chooses to either suffer 1 {STRAIN}, or apply +1 {EVADE} to the defense results.

common.name: Shock Troopers
text: When a Trooper attacks a figure within 2 spaces, apply +1 {SURGE} to the attack results.

common.name: Show of Force
text: When an Imperial figure deals 1 or more {DMG} to a target when attacking, that Imperial figure becomes Focused.

common.name: Superior Power
text: All Imperial figures gain +1 {DMG} to their attack results.

common.name: Surgical Strike
text: Each hero tests {STR}. Each hero that fails suffers 1 {STRAIN} and 1 {DMG}.
